name: Super Car Transport Duty
description:
Super Car Transport Duty is all about heavy duty truck driving on city roads. The game is for the fans of cargo truck games who want to have a realistic 3D car transporter truck. Carefully load and unload the cars from your car transporter truck and earn money to buy new trucks with advanced specs.
Features:
• The mission of the game is to load/unload cars in a transporter truck.
• Amazing selection of three heavy duty transporter trucks
• Park the cars securely to earn money
• Drive speedy sports cars using unique control system
• Realistic 3d environment with impressive graphics
